import { useState } from "react"; import Navigation from "../components/navigation"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { Form, Button, Modal } from "react-bootstrap"; import "./pet.css"; function PetRegister() { const navigate = useNavigate(); /* Modal Confirm */ const [showConfirm, setShowConfirm] = useState(false); const handleCloseConfirm = () => { setShowConfirm(false); setShowConfirmCancel(true); } const handleShowConfirm = () => setShowConfirm(true); /* Modal Confirm Cancel */ const [showConfirmCancel, setShowConfirmCancel] = useState(false); const handleCloseConfirmCancel = () => setShowConfirmCancel(false); const handleShowConfirmCancel = () => setShowConfirmCancel(true); return ( <>
